Grow With Confidence Powered by Nature,
Guided by BotaniQ.

Our smart gardening assistant helps you detect the perfect environment for your plants-before you even get your hands dirty. From sunlight to soil conditions, we provide insights to help your flowers, herbs, and indoor plants thrive. No guesswork. No stress. Just an easy, enjoyable way to grow greenery in your space.

Quick Access What You Need

Rekomendasi Tanaman

Tell us where you live, and we'll suggest the most suitable plants for your region based on weather, sunlight, and local conditions. Perfect for beginners and curious gardeners!

Manajemen Kebun

Your digital garden, organized. See all your plants, schedule when to water or fertilize them, and get notified when it's time. You'll never forget to care for your green friends again!

Why Choose BotaniQ

We built botaniq to help plant lovers of all levels, from curious beginners to seasoned gardeners, take care of their green companions with confidence and ease. Powered by smart technology and designed with simplicity in mind, botaniQ is more than just a tool - it's your personal plant assistant.

Whether you're just getting started or a seasoned grower, we provide the tools, insights, and support you need to nurture your green space with ease and confidence.
